register.description: Transcode configuration register: defines horizontal frame cropping

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Pixels to output per line when the values is between 1 and 8191.Pixels HSKIP-WIDTH pixels are output when HCOUNT=0. WIDTH corresponds to the image width provided by the sensor.
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Pixel to skip horizontally.Valid values: 0-8191

register.description: Transcode configuration register: defines vertical frame cropping

bitfield.description: Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Lines to output per frame when the values is between 1 and 8191.Pixels VSKIP-HEIGHT pixels are output when VCOUNT=0. HEIGHT corresponds to the image height provided by the sensor.
Write 0s for future compatibility. Read returns 0.
Pixel to skip verticallyValid values: 0-8191
